channel.description: 7switchinterfaces 1.0 Network Fundamentals1.1 Explain the role and function of network components 1.1.b L2 and L3 switches1.4 Describe switching concepts Configuring Speed, Duplex, and Description autonegotiate○○What speed to useenabled by default duplex {auto | full | half} and speed {auto | 10 | 100 | 1000} ○configure the speed and duplex settings (config - add a text description to the interface - int) # description text show interfaces status - lists port #, Name, status, vlan, duplex, speed, and type
